body: Am I the only one who has noticed that the jungle map is pretty much taking over walls recently?
body_tagged: Am I the only one who has noticed that the jungle map is pretty much taking over walls recently?
title: What's with the jungle?!?

replies.body:
Woah, that's a little insane...
I never play the walls, so I didn't notice 0-0
replies.body_tagged:
Woah, that's a little insane...
I never play the walls, so I didn't notice 0-0

replies.body: Mabye is glitched so when you try to join you get kicked. That means nobody can play so nobody can start and/or end the match. I recommend contact with a MapDev (Evocal, ParaSpider, IvyCode or Shirokamii)
replies.body_tagged: Mabye is glitched so when you try to join you get kicked. That means nobody can play so nobody can start and/or end the match. I recommend contact with a MapDev (Evocal, ParaSpider, IvyCode or Shirokamii)
